content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All employees have a duty to cooperate with EPAM investigations, whether conducted by internal personnel, or external persons at the direction of the company, to the greatest extent permitted by law. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To maintain a safe, healthy, and productive work environment, EPAM reserves the right at all times to search or inspect employees' surroundings and possessions if EPAM determines necessary in the course of an investigation. EPAM also reserves the right to monitor how employees use EPAM 's facilities, information and communications infrastructure, including equipment provided by EPAM to employees as well as any personal property of employees which is at any time connected to EPAM 's network or used to facilitate EPAM work or communications. When using any of EPAM's communications infrastructure, and/or conducting any EPAM activities, EPAM should always be considered a party in all communication.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
